bluedart.services module¶

File: services Author: Om Prakash <omprakash@gofynd.com> Date: 10/02/2017

It contains all the core service classes required for the bluedart.

class bluedart.services.CancelShipment(profile_creds)¶

Bases: bluedart.BlueDart

Cancel a already registered shipment request in bluedart. It extends the Parent class BlueDart.

Bases: bluedart.BlueDart

Module contents¶

class bluedart.BlueDart(request_url, https=False)¶

Bases: object

send_request()¶

Used to send the final SOAP request and to be called by subclass. It internally override the _send_request of subclass. :return: None
